sentences.en: African tribal societies were traditionally ruled by a council of elders.
sentences.cn: 非洲部落社会传统上由长老会统治。

sentences.en: Although exceptions could be made, the rule still stands.
sentences.cn: 虽然可能有例外，但该规定仍然有效。

sentences.en: As a rule, we take the bus.
sentences.cn: 通常，我乘公共汽车

sentences.en: Hanson's golden rule is to add value to whatever business he buys.
sentences.cn: 汉森的成功原则是不论收购什么样的企业都要使其增值。

sentences.en: He announced that henceforth he would rule by decree (= make all the important decisions himself ) .
sentences.cn: 他宣布他将从此实行专制统治。

sentences.en: His rule was ordained by heaven.
sentences.cn: 他的统治乃是天命。

sentences.en: I make it a rule never to mix business with pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我习惯于从不把工作和娱乐弄混。

sentences.en: I'm going to stop letting drugs and drink rule my life.
sentences.cn: 我决心不再让毒品和酒精控制我的生活。

sentences.en: It's the rule of life that everything you have always wanted comes the very second you stop looking for it.
sentences.cn: 生活就是这样，你一直想要得到的东西，总在你不再指望的那一刻姗姗来迟。

sentences.en: Nurses are continuing to work to rule.
sentences.cn: 护士们还在消极怠工。

sentences.en: Queen Victoria ruled England for 64 years.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚女王统治英格兰64年。

sentences.en: stress is not predictable by rule and must be learned word by word.
sentences.cn: 重音不可按规则预测，必须逐词学习。

sentences.en: The agree-ment gives the territory limited self-rule.
sentences.cn: 这个协议规定该地区享有有限的自治权。

sentences.en: The economy of the times made it difficult to support centralized rule.
sentences.cn: 当时的经济状况不利于实行集权统治。

sentences.en: The golden rule in tennis is to keep your eye on the ball.
sentences.cn: 打好网球的重要原则是眼要紧盯着球。

sentences.en: The golden rule is never to clean a valuable coin.
sentences.cn: 重要的原则是决不清除贵重硬币上的污垢。

sentences.en: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.cn: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

sentences.en: The option of starting over has been ruled out.
sentences.cn: 重新开始这种选择已被排除考虑

sentences.en: the prime minister ruled out a November election.
sentences.cn: 首相排除了11月份进行选举的可能性。

sentences.en: The rule applies where a person owns stock in a corporation.
sentences.cn: 该规定适用于持有公司股票的人。

sentences.en: The snowstorm ruled out their weekly meeting.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪使他们一周一次的会议无法举行

sentences.en: The South African president has negotiated an end to white-minority rule.
sentences.cn: 南非总统已通过谈判达成协议，结束了少数白人的统治。

sentences.en: The tissue is examined microscopically to rule out or confirm cancer.
sentences.cn: 利用显微镜检查组织，以排除或确认癌变。

sentences.en: There are no hard and fast rules (= clear and definite rules ) about what to wear to classes.
sentences.cn: 对于上课着装并没有硬性规定。

sentences.en: They have been exercising what amounts to mob rule.
sentences.cn: 他们一直在实行相当于暴政的统治。

sentences.en: They obey the one unwritten rule that binds them all—no talking.
sentences.cn: 他们都遵守着那条约束他们所有人的默认规则——要守口如瓶。

words.tran_cn: 有横隔线的；有直线行的；受统治的
统治的；主要的；支配的；流行的，普遍的
尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人
统治者的地位；职权或任期

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，幽默 )…必胜（用于表达某人对具体的人或物的热情）
按规则，照规矩，循规蹈矩地
金科玉律；指导原则；黄金法则
少数服从多数原则；多数决定原则
惯于，作为常例；定为常规

phrases.phrase: make it a rule to do something
phrases.tran_cn: 有做某事的习惯，有做某事的原则
经验法则，凭经验或实践得来的法则
(英)粗略检查（是否正确或恰当）

trans.tran_cn: 规则，条例，行事准则，常规，统治，尺
trans.tran_en: an official instruction that says how things must be done or what is allowed, especially in a game, organization, or job

trans.tran_cn: 控制，统治，支配，裁定，画（直线）
trans.tran_en: to have the official power to control a country and the people who live there
to have the official power to control a country and the people who live there
